name: horizon-electron
author: The F-List Team and Horizon Contributors

scripts.webpack:dev: mkdir -p dist && node ../webpack development | tee dist/build.log
scripts.webpack:prod: mkdir -p dist && node ../webpack production | tee dist/build.log
scripts.build:win: mkdir -p dist && (node ../webpack production && electron-builder --win nsis --arm64 --x64) | tee dist/build.log
scripts.build:dev:win: mkdir -p dist && (node ../webpack development && electron-builder --win nsis --arm64 --x64) | tee dist/build.log
scripts.build:mac: mkdir -p dist && (node ../webpack production && electron-builder --mac dmg --universal) | tee dist/build.log
scripts.build:dev:mac: mkdir -p dist && (node ../webpack development && electron-builder --mac dmg --universal) | tee dist/build.log
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p dist && (node ../webpack production && electron-builder --linux deb tar.gz AppImage --arm64 --x64) | tee dist/build.log
scripts.build:dev:linux: mkdir -p dist && (node ../webpack development && electron-builder --linux deb tar.gz AppImage --arm64 --x64) | tee dist/build.log
